summary: This is an email forwarding Judge Alison Nathan's opinion on Ghislaine Maxwell's pretrial motions. The opinion grants the motion to sever perjury counts, denies most other motions, and defers decision on suppression motions related to Boies Schiller materials.

persons.name: Judge Nathan
persons.context: Issued the opinion on Ghislaine Maxwell's pretrial motions, granting severance of perjury counts and denying most other motions.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the pretrial motions opinion; her motions to sever perjury counts were granted while others were denied.

connections.description: Judge Nathan issued a judicial opinion ruling on Maxwell's pretrial motions.

events.title: Issuance of Opinion on Maxwell's Pretrial Motions
events.description: Judge Alison Nathan issued an opinion granting Ghislaine Maxwell's motion to sever perjury counts, denying most other pretrial motions, and deferring decision on suppression motions related to Boies Schiller materials.

keyFacts: Judge Alison Nathan granted Ghislaine Maxwell's motion to sever the perjury counts from her other charges.
Judge Nathan denied the majority of Maxwell's other pretrial motions.
The opinion deferred a decision on suppression motions related to materials from the law firm Boies Schiller, stating they would be decided 'in due course'.
